data.eml:eml: The genus Ontherus Erichson 1847 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): description of a new species, and notes on the genus in Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume González, Fabio Arturo, Medina, Claudia Alejandra (2015): The genus Ontherus Erichson 1847 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): description of a new species, and notes on the genus in Colombia. Zootaxa 3949 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.1.3
